68class inet_address : public sock_address
69{
71 sockaddr_in addr_{};
72
74 static constexpr size_t SZ = sizeof(sockaddr_in);
75
76public:
78 static constexpr sa_family_t ADDRESS_FAMILY = AF_INET;
79
84 inet_address() = default;
91 inet_address(uint32_t addr, in_port_t port);
98 explicit inet_address(in_port_t port) : inet_address(in_addr_t(INADDR_ANY), port) {}
107 inet_address(const string& saddr, in_port_t port);
115 inet_address(const string& saddr, in_port_t port, error_code& ec) noexcept;
120 inet_address(const sockaddr& addr) { std::memcpy(&addr_, &addr, SZ); }
125 inet_address(const sock_address& addr) { std::memcpy(&addr_, addr.sockaddr_ptr(), SZ); }
130 inet_address(const sockaddr_in& addr) : addr_{addr} {}
135 inet_address(const inet_address& addr) : addr_{addr.addr_} {}
144 static result<inet_address> create(const string& saddr, in_port_t port) noexcept;
152 bool is_set() const noexcept override { return addr_.sin_family == ADDRESS_FAMILY; }
158 static result<in_addr_t> resolve_name(const string& saddr) noexcept;
163 in_addr_t address() const { return ntohl(addr_.sin_addr.s_addr); }
169 uint8_t operator[](int i) const {
170 in_addr_t addr = address();
171 return ((const uint8_t*)&addr)[i];
172 }
177 in_port_t port() const { return ntohs(addr_.sin_port); }
184 socklen_t size() const override { return socklen_t(SZ); }
189 const sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() const override {
190 return reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr*>(&addr_);
191 }
196 sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() override { return reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&addr_); }
201 const sockaddr_in* sockaddr_in_ptr() const {
202 return static_cast<const sockaddr_in*>(&addr_);
203 }
208 sockaddr_in* sockaddr_in_ptr() { return static_cast<sockaddr_in*>(&addr_); }
216 string to_string() const;
217};
